name: Droid Delver
description:
Control options:

  • WASD + E to use
  • Arrows + Space to use
  • Numpad 8456 + 9 to use

Collect all of the "coins" before you can progress through the door to the next level. Use "upgrades" (sign posts) to get around obstacles and reach coins.

Made from Scratch in Typescript bfor the Nokia game jam 4

Note: the levels loop once you get to the end
